title: Iowa Special Episode, Part 2: The Aftermath
description:
In part two of our special series about the Iowa caucuses, Late Night supervising producer Henry Melcher follows up with a few people he spoke to while in Des Moines to understand how Iowans felt about the election fiasco on Monday, resulting in a vote whose results are delayed — if they ever come out at all.

He also conducts some interviews to learn more about the activism and organization that helps mobilize people of color during Iowa elections.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
